  • We are a coalition.

    We are experienced technical, military, and government people who have come together to make OSS-based solutions more accessible.

Homekaiamaeve2020-09-14T22:31:07+00:00

Mission.

WE PROVIDE A STARTING POINT.

As long time veterans of Open Source Software (OSS), we saw the need for two additional resources. (1) An accurate, dynamic map of available resources and programs in the open source space, and (2) Accessible guidance from vendor-neutral, technology agnostic experts.

Our mission at the OSSI, with the Open Source Navigator (OSN) is to be an Information Booth at the entrance to that grand exhibit hall of your options. We want to help you find the best programs and resources available to facilitate your mission. These resources come from all different sectors. We can help you find the right one.

Mission.

WE PROVIDE A STARTING POINT.

As long time veterans of Open Source Software (OSS), we saw the need for two additional resources. (1) An accurate, dynamic map of available resources and programs in the open source space, and (2) Accessible guidance from vendor-neutral, technology agnostic experts.

Our mission at the OSSI, with the Open Source Navigator (OSN) is to be an Information Booth at the entrance to that grand exhibit hall of your options. We want to help you find the best programs and resources available to facilitate your mission. These resources come from all different sectors. We can help you find the right one.

OS Navigator

This is HOW You Chart a Better Course.

If the OSSI is the Information Booth at the entrance to the exhibit hall, the Open Source Navigator (OSN) lets you plot your course along the map.

As a member of the OSSI, you are able to drill down and create a custom view of the Navigator. You can make it show you exactly what you want to know. This Institute, in partnership with our sponsors, will maintain and grow the Dynamic OSN as the Open Source space continues to expand.

COMING SOON!

OS Navigator

This is HOW You Chart a Better Course.

COMING SOON!

What the Navigator gives you

If the OSSI is the Information Booth at the entrance to the exhibit hall, the Open Source Navigator (OSN) lets you plot your course along the map.

As a member of the OSSI, you are able to drill down and create a custom view of the Navigator. You can make it show you exactly what you want to know. This Institute, in partnership with our sponsors, will maintain and grow the Dynamic OSN as the Open Source space continues to expand.
